tasks.description: Scope out project, create implementation plan, and define JSON schemas
Initialize Breadboard project and install dependencies
Implement Stage 1 & 2: Input Trigger and Director Node with JSON Schema
Implement Stage 3: Scene Copywriter using Repeater node
Assemble full graph, handle JSON output file generation
Implement Antigravity Bridge (Node.js Server) to replace Gemini API
Refactor Breadboard Graph to use Fetch/Bridge instead of Specialist
Verify workflow with 'House Music History' example using Bridge
